M

main(String[]) - Static method in class simulator.SimulatorInitializationExample
Main method where the simulator's controller is initialized by calling the Initialize() method and passing in the action listener for button events.
MainView - Class in simulator
MainView sets up the entire simulator interface and ties all components together.
MainView(MainViewController, ActionListener) - Constructor for class simulator.MainView
Constructor for the MainView.
MainViewController - Class in simulator
This controller can be used to control any aspect of the simulator.
MainViewController(ActionListener) - Constructor for class simulator.MainViewController
Private constructor for the MainViewController that initializes the view with the amount of braille cells and buttons specified in Settings.
MainViewController(ActionListener, int, int) - Constructor for class simulator.MainViewController
Private constructor for the MainViewController that initializes the view with the specified amount of braille cells and buttons.
mainViewController - Static variable in class simulator.MainViewController
Static variable containing the MainViewController singleton.
makeButtons(int) - Method in class simulator.MainView
Creates the given amount of buttons.
makeCells(int) - Method in class simulator.MainView
Creates the given amount of braille cells by creating BrailleCellView objects and attaching them to the main view.
makePin() - Method in class simulator.BrailleCellView
Creates two columns of type JPanel and then inserts 4 JLabels in each column.
